data.route_analysis: Flights to Guatemala typically connect through major U.S. cities. Traffic is moderate in autumn. Local transport includes buses and shuttles.
data.pricing_trends: Prices tend to drop in autumn, with flights and accommodations often discounted by 20-30%.
data.seasonal_patterns: High season from November to April. Autumn offers fewer tourists and mild weather.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking windows are 2-3 months in advance for the best deals.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Flights to Guatemala typically connect through major U.S. cities. Traffic is moderate in autumn. Local transport includes buses and shuttles.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: High season from November to April. Autumn offers fewer tourists and mild weather.
destination_insights.climate: Temperatures range from 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F). Mild and dry conditions ideal for exploration.
destination_insights.culture: Cultural festivals celebrate indigenous heritage, especially during the Day of the Dead in early November.
destination_insights.attractions: Key sites include Tikal National Park, Lake Atitlán, and the colonial charm of Antigua.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices tend to drop in autumn, with flights and accommodations often discounted by 20-30%.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking windows are 2-3 months in advance for the best deals.
market_insights.demand: Demand usually rises in late August as travelers prepare for the winter season.
market_insights.competition: Competitors include Costa Rica and Mexico, but Guatemala offers a unique cultural experience.

trend_insights.market_trends: Sustainability in travel is on the rise. Eco-tourism is gaining popularity among travelers in Guatemala.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers prefer experiential trips where they engage with local cultures and environments.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Guatemala differentiates itself through diversity in natural attractions and rich history.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Autumn sees fewer crowds, allowing for more intimate experiences in popular sites.
